name: OurCommunityCreditUnion
0:
”Alexa, open Our Community Voice Banking”
”What's my balance”
”Transfer ten dollars from savings to checking”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our community voice banking
des:
Talk to Alexa from the comfort of your living room for your everyday banking needs. Whether you need information about Our Community Credit Union or move $50 to your Savings accounts in a jiffy, just ask Alexa to do it for you.

You’ll need to log in with your online banking username and password to link your bank account to this skill using either the Alexa app on your phone or alexa.amazon.com in your web browser.

For your security, you’ll be asked to set up a four-digit voice key.

Here are few things you can ask Alexa:
• Alexa, ask Our Community Voice Banking for the routing number.
• Alexa, ask Our Community Voice Banking what to do if I’ve lost my debit card.

To access your accounts, launch the skill by saying
• Alexa, open Our Community Voice Banking”

Once your account is linked, say "Alexa, open Our Community Voice banking" and try any of these examples:

Account Balances:
 • How much money do I have?
 • What's the balance of my savings account?
 • How much do I have in Checking?

Transfers:
 • Transfer twenty dollars from savings to checking

Payments:
 • Pay my credit card
 • When is my auto loan due?
 • Make a mortgage payment

Locations:
 • Where is the nearest branch?
 • Where is the nearest ATM?

Information
 • What's the routing number?
 • I forgot my voice key
 • I lost my debit card
 • How do I change my PIN?
 • What's the website?

All transactions done using Alexa will be visible under the Activity tab in the Alexa App. Transaction confirmation will be made available to you using the Skill card.

If you need help during the course of a conversation, say “Help” to ask Alexa for assistance.

Privacy disclaimer: This skill accesses your account information, speaks it aloud and displays it on Echo devices with screens.
